pages.text: Crafting rituals is an intricate business; Even if you have the correct $(item)Inscription Tools$(), you can't just slap runic inscriptions down any old how and expect things to happen. Luckily, the $(item)Ritual Diviner$() is here to help.

The base Ritual Diviner requires one of each $(item)Elemental Inscription Tool$() for its construction, and thus a tier 3 $(l:altar/bloodaltar)Blood Altar$(/l). The four base Elemental Inscription Tools can be crafted in your Altar for 1,000 LP each: $(li)Air: a $(item)Ghast Tear$(). $(li)Fire: some $(item)Magma Cream$(). $(li)Water: a $(item)Block of Lapis Lazuli$(). $(li)Earth: a $(item)Block of Obsidian$().

There is also an augmented version of the Ritual Diviner, for creating more powerful rituals. For this you will require a tier four Altar, and two $(item)Inscription Tool: Dusk$()s. These can be crafted in your altar with a $(item)Block of Coal$() and 2,000LP.
